com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.service

Interface PetActionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PetActionServiceImpl

    public PetActionService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PetActionService

        public PetActionService()

    • Method Detail

      • callPet

        <P> void callPet(P player)

        Calls the pet to the given player. If the pet is not enabled, it will be enabled after calling.

        See Also:
        player

      • disablePet

        <P> void disablePet(P player)

        Disables the pet of the given player.

        See Also:
        player

      • togglePet

        <P> void togglePet(P player)

        Toggles the pet of the given player. If the pet is disabled it will be enabled and when enabled it will be disabled.

        See Also:
        player

      • applyAI

        <P> NonExistentClass applyAI(P player,
                             java.util.List<? extends com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.persistence.entity.AIBase> addAis,
                             java.util.List<? extends com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.persistence.entity.AIBase> removeAis)

        Applies the given ais to the pet of the given player. Returns a pair of added and removed ais amount.

      • renamePet

        <P> void renamePet(P player,
                   java.lang.String name)

        Renames the pet of the given player to the given name.

        See Also:
        player, name

      • launchPet

        <P> void launchPet(P player)

        Launches the pet of the player.

      • changePetSkin

        <P> void changePetSkin(P player,
                       java.lang.String skin)

        Sets the pet of the given player to the given skin.

        See Also:
        player
